SELECT r.idx, r.courseIdx, r.memberId, r.content, r.rating, r.regDate, r.modifyDate, m.name AS memberName FROM tbl_review r JOIN tbl_member m ON r.memberId = m.memberId WHERE r.courseIdx = #{courseIdx} ORDER BY
r.regDate DESC
r.rating DESC
r.rating ASC
LIMIT #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_review(courseIdx, memberId, content, rating) VALUES(#{courseIdx}, #{memberId}, #{content}, #{rating})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(r.idx) AS reviewCount FROM tbl_course c LEFT JOIN tbl_review r ON c.idx = r.courseIdx WHERE c.teacherId = #{memberId};
